title: Giorgia Motta
text:
Giorgia Motta is an Italian <a href="women%27s%20soccer">football</a> <a href="defender%20%28soccer%29">defender</a>, currently playing for <a href="Torres%20Calcio%20Femminile">Torres CF</a> in <a href="Serie%20A%20%28women%27s%20football%29">Serie A</a>. She has also played for <a href="Bardolino%20CF">Bardolino CF</a> in Serie A and <a href="AD%20Torrej%C3%B3n%20CF%20%28women%29">AD Torrejón</a> in the <a href="Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n%20%28women%29">Spanish Superleague</a>. She has played the <a href="UEFA%20Women%27s%20Champions%20League">Champions League</a> with Bardolino and Torres.
She is a member of the <a href="Italy%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Italian national team</a>, taking part in the <a href="UEFA%20Women%27s%20Euro%202009">2009 European Championship</a>'s squad.
